code: public void testFlushWithBlocks() {     createIndex("test").     ensureGreen("test").     NumShards numShards = getNumShards("test").     int docs = between(10, 100).     for (int i = 0. i < docs. i++) {         client().prepareIndex("test", "type", "" + i).setSource("test", "init").execute().actionGet().     }     // Request is not blocked     for (String blockSetting : Arrays.asList(SETTING_BLOCKS_READ, SETTING_BLOCKS_WRITE, SETTING_READ_ONLY, SETTING_BLOCKS_METADATA, SETTING_READ_ONLY_ALLOW_DELETE)) {         try {             enableIndexBlock("test", blockSetting).             FlushResponse response = client().admin().indices().prepareFlush("test").execute().actionGet().             assertNoFailures(response).             assertThat(response.getSuccessfulShards(), equalTo(numShards.totalNumShards)).         } finally {             disableIndexBlock("test", blockSetting).         }     } }
